;Search
Advanced field-level search with support for both standard matching and regular expressions.

;Code and demo
To explore plugin features, syntax, tutorials, and examples, refer to the demo and code pages:

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Search/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Search
